name: 2025 IEEE the 14th International Conference on Communications, Circuits, and Systems
content: Conference Publication: Accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, will be published in the ICCCAS Conference Proceedings. Conference content will be submitted for inclusion into IEEE Xplore and indexed by 【Ei Compendex and Scopus】, as well as other Abstracting and Indexing (A&I) databases.
organizers: IEEE and Wuhan University of Technology, China
